participant_1.background:
I am known for my dedication and work ethic.
I work long shifts and miss my son.
I loved spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
I love cooking for my family and friends, and my cat loves to eat it too!
i want a dog , but that is a lot of commitment.

participant_2.background:
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
i cannot get enough ginger snaps.
i have been bankrupt and back.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Hello! It is going pretty well. How about yours?
It is going well, thanks! I'm just at home, working on my latest project.
Nice! What kind of project are you working on?
I am working on a new recipe for a ginger snap cookie. I love ginger snaps, but I've never tried to make them myself.
That sounds delicious! I love ginger snaps too. I always get a little too excited when I bake them, and I end up eating way too many.
I know what you mean! I have to be careful not to eat them all before I even finish baking them.
I think we have similar taste in snacks. I also love red wine, but I've been sticking to water since I broke my leg.
Oh no! I hope you are healing up well. I don't blame you for sticking to water. Red wine is a little too hard on the body.
Thanks! I am healing up slowly but surely. I'm glad you're not having any trouble with your project.
Thanks! I'm sure it will be delicious. I'm just waiting for the dough to cool down so I can taste it.
I'm sure it will be great! Let me know if you need any taste testers.
Haha, thanks for the offer! I will definitely keep you in mind.
